text: is mein koee ilzaam nahin hai ki (haj ke saath) tum apane paravaradigaar ke phazal (nafa tijaarat) kee khvaahish karo aur phir jab tum araphaat se chal khade ho to masharul haraam ke paas khuda ka jikr karo aur us kee yaad bhee karo to jis tarah tumhe bataaya hai agarache tum isake pahale to gumaraaho se the
